question: Which leader wrote the Srimad Bhagavad Gita Rahasya while he was jailed in Myanmar?
explanation: Bal Gangadhar Tilak (or Lokmanya Tilak, born in 23 July 1856 â€“ 1 August 1920 as Keshav Gangadhar Tilak, was an Indian nationalist, teacher, lawyer and an independence activist. He wrote the Srimad Bhagavad Gita Rahasya while he was jailed in Myanmar.
